mapper.select: SELECT a.class_no, a.spot_no, a.class_name, a.user_id AS class_user_id, a.room_no, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.delete_yn, a.max_people, SUM(IF(IFNULL(b.graduate_code, 'APPLY') NOT IN('APPLY','H'), 1, 0)) AS now_people, -- 정상적인 집계 IF(MAX(b.user_id) IN (#{userId}), IFNULL(MAX(b.graduate_code), ''), '') AS graduate_code, -- MAX()로 한 명만 선택 c.name, d.room_name FROM tbl_class a LEFT JOIN tbl_user_class b ON a.class_no = b.class_no LEFT JOIN tbl_user c ON a.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_class_room d ON a.room_no = d.room_no WHERE a.delete_yn = 'N' GROUP BY a.class_no ORDER BY CASE WHEN NOW() > a.end_date THEN 999 WHEN NOW() > a.start_date THEN 99 ELSE a.start_date END;

SELECT COALESCE( a.max_people - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_user_class b WHERE b.class_no = a.class_no AND b.graduate_code NOT IN ('APPLY', 'H')), a.max_people ) AS remaining_people FROM tbl_class a WHERE a.class_no = #{classNo} AND a.delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY a.class_no;

SELECT SUM(IF(DATEDIFF(IFNULL(end_date, #{startDate}), #{startDate}) >= 0, DATEDIFF(IFNULL(end_date, #{startDate}), #{startDate}), 0)) FROM tbl_user_class a LEFT JOIN tbl_class b ON a.class_no = b.class_no WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND b.delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT B.user_id, C.name, C.user_birth, B.create_dt, B.graduate_code, A.max_people, (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM tbl_user_class WHERE class_no = #{classNo} AND graduate_code NOT IN ('APPLY', 'H')) AS now_people FROM tbl_class A LEFT JOIN tbl_user_class B ON A.class_no = B.class_no JOIN tbl_user C ON B.user_id = C.user_id AND C.delete_yn = 'N' WHERE A.class_no = #{classNo} GROUP BY B.user_id, C.name, C.user_birth, B.create_dt, B.graduate_code, A.max_people ORDER BY CASE WHEN B.graduate_code = 'NO' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END, B.create_dt DESC;
